Our Facility

Terminal Wire Assembly Factory

A state-of-the-art manufacturing facility dedicated to precision terminal wire assembly and custom wire harness production. We serve global OEMs with cost-effective, high-quality solutions.

07 Packaging & Global Shipping

Professional Packaging

Custom packaging solutions to protect products during transit. Anti-static, moisture-proof, and shock-resistant options available.

Global Shipping

Worldwide delivery through reliable logistics partners. Express air freight and sea freight options for urgent or volume orders.

Quality Assurance

Final inspection and testing before packaging. Complete traceability with batch numbering and quality certificates.
